channel.title: Email system glitch?
channel.description:
I tried setting an email on my account, and now my inbox keeps getting spammed with email auth codes for accounts that aren't even mine... Now it says that I'm blocked from accessing the email page. So far I got a total of 17 auth codes for 5 different accounts, and none of them are mine. Has this happened to anyone before? It's getting kind of annoying.
Here's a video to show it's not a phish: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YZDJTmTyP0k

item.title: Email system glitch?
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

Davidi2:

I’d ban people for trying to recover active accounts, that’s wayyyyyyyy different than recovering inactive accounts.

I wouldn’t even try to recover them if I could. I’m not like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Email system glitch?
item.dc:creator: @shawn4 shawn__
item.description:
@shawn4 wrote:

[quote=“Exion, post:13, topic:419125”][quote author=Stupit link=topic=521656.msg3791304#msg3791304 date=1319312651]
You can recover via email…
[/quote]
Yes, but I would need to know the other persons email in order to do so. Plus all of the codes are already registered.[/quote]

Not if the bug add your ip to hes account, but sure if its already registered then it wont work.

@david, I agree but who cares, its full of autoers anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Email system glitch?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“shawn__, post:12, topic:419125”]if you verify their accounts you can recover the pw, should work.[/quote]But that would be a massive dick move.

It could also be someone spamming your email (can’t be sure of course), the ‘from’ can be easily spoofed with PHP mail functions by anyone

Read full topic

item.title: Email system glitch?
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

shawn__:

You might be able to recovor other peoples account?

Doubt it. All it gives is the username and email code. Nothing else. I did look up some of the accounts and some are pretty decent.

Read full topic

item.title: Email system glitch?
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:7, topic:419125”]Check the link that they link you to. Is it actually runescape.com? (Follow the link, dont log in or anything though)

If it’s not, check where it DOES link to, and post it here. That way we can whois and report them to jagex

Main problem is, they misspelled authorization :P[/quote]
I’m pretty sure that’s how they spell it in England/Britain or whatever.

Here’s a video since people keep saying it’s a phish when it’s clearly NOT:

Read full topic

item.title: Email system glitch?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Check the link that they link you to. Is it actually runescape.com? (Follow the link, dont log in or anything though)

If it’s not, check where it DOES link to, and post it here. That way we can whois and report them to jagex

Main problem is, they misspelled authorization

Read full topic

item.title: Email system glitch?
item.dc:creator: @Vexx Vexx
item.description:
@Vexx wrote:

[quote=“Exion, post:5, topic:419125”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=521656.msg3791114#msg3791114 date=1319302727]
Phishing emails, why would they email you after explicitly explaining that Jagex will never attempt to contact you via email. Also sent in two different languages, purdy obvius
[/quote]
No, they’re not. When you want to add an email to your account they send you an email with an authorization code… Plus, the email domain is noreply@email.jagex.com[/quote]
its a phis bro. i get these all the time, just ignore them.

Read full topic

item.title: Email system glitch?
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

Someone making accounts in your name to piss you off?

Not sure. Two news items were just added to the main RuneScape homepage about Infrastructure Maintenance and Phishing Emails, though. I checked the email addresses that the emails were sent from and they are the legit Jagex emails.

Edit: Says they were added yesterday but I just started seeing them today. :o

Edit2: Here’s a pic of my inbox…

2jcbxc6.png938×816

Read full topic
